0: When I asked about a shuttle to the airport to rent a car I was told that the shuttle only comes twice a day at 10 and 30
If you are far from the pool area you wait for a shuttle tomoick you up takes forever to wait
there is also no shuttle buses we had a rental but it would nice to take a shuttle
But there were not enough people on staff so there were about 20 tables still dirty because there was not enough people to bus them
Also some people complained about bug bites you are in a tropical location
The location is fairly isolated and a car rental would be necessary to visit San Juan or the beautiful beaches in Luquilo
Otherwise your only options are to eat at the restaurants located on the property which are quite pricey as one would expect from hotel restaurants
The hotel is divided into tiny villas there is continuous cart transportation that will take you anywhere in the hotel area
You have to pay for a shuttle to pick you up from the airport after you have spent all the money for your stay
1: nice hotel in a good location
The location and the infrastructure is very good
Ok the good news is that this location is spectacular
We stayed in the red level with a ocean view located near the pool
There are fun activities around the resort that you will need transportation to get around to
Grounds friendly staff comfortable mattress and location to rain forest
Every hotel worker we encountered was fantastic with the exception of the girl in charge of scheduling the shuttle to the airport
Great location near the beach and our room had great views
The beach that is located in the back is a small one but to be honest the water is warm the sea is peaceful and atmosphere is so calm

having read the good and the bad before going i had some concerns but our stay was very pleasanthe rooms were lovely well appointed and cleaned on time without a problemthe staff in every position unfailingly pleasanthe beach is beautiful and lounge chairs umbrellas and towels abundantpol terificwe had the club add on which is well worth it for a family with one or two children as it includes an ample breakfast buffet afternoon nibbles water perier and an honor bar for beer or wine
